text: muhminkale! Oru camukattar piriyatoru camukattaraip parikacam ceyya ventam. Enenil (parikacikkappatuvor), avarkalaivita melanavarkalaka irukkalam; (avvare) entap penkalum, marrentap penkalaiyum (parikacam ceyya ventam) - enenil ivarkal avarkalai vita melanavarkalaka irukkalam; innum, unkalil oruvarukkoruvar palittuk kollatirkal, innum (unkalil) oruvaraiyoruvar (tiya) pattappeyarkalal alaikkatirkal; iman kontapin (avvaru tiya) pattap peyar cuttuvatu mikak kettatakum; evarkal (ivarriliruntu) milavillaiyo, attakaiyavarkal aniyayakkararkal avarkal
